title: Horizontal Asymptote
text: Determine what value $$y$$ approaches as $$x$$ approaches infinity or negative infinity to find the horizontal asymptote.

title: Horizontal Asymptote
text: As $$x$$ apporaches negative $$\infty$$, $$e^x$$ approaches $$0$$. Therefore, the horizontal asymptote is $$y=0+2=2$$.
